Eva Warigia bụ nwanyị Kenya na-azụ ahịa na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke East Africa Private Equity & Venture Capital Association (EAVCA), nke dị na Nairobi, Kenya
EAVCA bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị isi ego na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mpaghara ahụ, nke ebumnuche ya bụ "ịkwalite mmata na itinye aka n'ihe gbasara amụma na mpaghara ahụ".
A mụrụ ya na Kenya ọ wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Mahadum nke Nairobi
Ka ọ na-erule Mee 2020, Eva Warigia na-achụso nzere Master of Business Administration, site na Strathmore Business School na Nairobi.
Ntinye aka Warigia na isi ego na-alaghachi na mmalite afọ 2010
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka Co-Executive Director na EAVCA, iji soro Esther Ndeti jee ozi
Ọrụ ha jikọtara ọnụ bụ ịbawanye "nkwado, ọgụgụ isi, netwọkụ na ọzụzụ na ego onwe onye" na mpaghara ahụ.
Na EAVCA, ya na ndị otu ahia, na-arụkọ ọrụ na mba ofesi iji mee ka obodo mara isi obodo na ego onwe onye, dị ka isi mmalite ọzọ nke isi obodo
EAVCA na-eme nnyocha ụlọ ọrụ na-egosipụta ohere ndị dị na East Africa
Warigia na-ekpuchi mba Ethiopia, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda na Uganda.
Tupu ọrụ ya na EAVCA, Eva rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nnukwu onye ndụmọdụ na Africa Practice (East Africa), ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị na Nairobi.
